newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: MANILA'S AAHC SETS RIGHT ISSUE RECORD DATE.
newsitem.headline: MANILA'S AAHC SETS RIGHT ISSUE RECORD DATE.

text.p: Asia Amalgamated Holdings Corp (AAHC) said on Thursday it had set September 3 as the record date for shareholders to be able to buy new shares under the rights offering.
A stockholders can buy three new common shares for every one share held.
The issue, involving 60 billion new shares, will be offered at one centavo apiece and will raise an estimated net proceeds of 592.4 million pesos.
AAHC said bulk of the proceeds will be used to repay stockholders' advances amounting to 333 million pesos for initial investments in Ecology Savings Bank, an AAHC subsidiary.
The offer period has been set on Sept 10 to 16.
AAHC is the financial services company of the Gow family, majority owner of retailer Uniwide Holdings Inc.
